result.eng: I woke up early in the morning.
result.ga: Mhúscail mé go moch ar maidin
result.orig: Mhúscail mé go moch ar maidin
result.html: Mhúscail mé go moch ar maidinI woke up early in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Ṁúscail mé go moċ ar maidinI woke up early in the morning.

result.eng: I have to get up early in the morning.
result.ga: Caithfidh mé éirí go moch ar maidin
result.orig: Caithfidh mé éirí go moch ar maidin
result.html: Caithfidh mé éirí go moch ar maidinI have to get up early in the morning.
result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ mé éirí go moċ ar maidinI have to get up early in the morning.

result.eng: Do you get up early in the morning?
result.ga: An éiríonn sibh go moch ar maidin
result.orig: An éiríonn sibh go moch ar maidin
result.html: An éiríonn sibh go moch ar maidinDo you get up early in the morning?
result.ponchtml: An éiríonn siḃ go moċ ar maidinDo you get up early in the morning?
